analyzed: phyag rgya'i mkha' la gsang ba spyod thig le'i rgyun 'byung ba'i bde ba ni/_/de ni dar bab mig
translated: The bliss that arises from the flow of the bindu of the secret conduct in the space of the mudra is the empowerment of the eyes.ğŸ”½The secret empowerment is the empowerment of the eyes.

original: drag tu gtad gsang dbang ngo /_/rdo rje'i thig le rtsher gnas te phab pa'i bde ba ni/_/
analyzed: drag tu gtad gsang dbang ngo /_/rdo rje'i thig le rtsher gnas te phab pa'i bde ba ni/_/
translated: The bliss of the retention and descent of the bindu of the vajra is the empowerment of the third empowerment.

original: dmigs pa drag shes rab ye shes na tshhod dgan po'i dbang /_/phyag rgya chen po gsum pa ngo
analyzed: dmigs pa drag shes rab ye shes na tshhod dgan po'i dbang /_/phyag rgya chen po gsum pa ngo
translated: The third empowerment is the great seal.ğŸ”½The post-equipoise state is the experience of the third empowerment, which arises from the attachment to the subsequent gnosis of the wisdom consort.

original: sprod pa'i rjes shes rjes chags las/_/skyes pa gsum pa myong ba la brjod ma shes pa ka bzhi pa ngo sprod pa
analyzed: sprod pa'i rjes shes rjes chags las/_/skyes pa gsum pa myong ba la brjod ma shes pa ka bzhi pa ngo sprod pa
translated: The fourth empowerment is the introduction.

original: yin gang gnas bde ba ni/_/de ni na tshhod skye dgu skye dgu'i bdag por shes/_/shesğŸ”½rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur gsum po rim pa yis/_/lus bum pa ngag gsang ba yid ni shes
analyzed: yin gang gnas bde ba ni/_/de ni na tshhod skye dgu skye dgu'i bdag por shes/_/shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur gsum po rim pa yis/_/lus bum pa ngag gsang ba yid ni shes
translated: The bliss that abides in any of those is recognized as the lord of all beings.ğŸ”½The three stages of the conferral of the gnosis of the wisdom consort purify the body, the vase; the voice, the secret; and the mind, the gnosis of wisdom.

original: rab ye shes yang dag sbyong /_/bzhi pa phyag rgya chen po'i dbang gis ye shes dag byed pa'o/_/
analyzed: rab ye shes yang dag sbyong /_/bzhi pa phyag rgya chen po'i dbang gis ye shes dag byed pa'o/_/
translated: The fourth empowerment, the great seal, purifies gnosis.

original: dang po'i rig pa'i dbang bdun gang yin pa/_/byis pa las dang po pa rnams ni
analyzed: dang po'i rig pa'i dbang bdun gang yin pa/_/byis pa las dang po pa rnams ni
translated: The first seven empowerments of knowledge are for the sake of the childish, the beginners.

original: bzhugs phyir ro/_/rnam gsum rnal 'byor pa 'bring po 'jig rten kun rdzogs pa/_/
analyzed: bzhugs phyir ro/_/rnam gsum rnal 'byor pa 'bring po 'jig rten kun rdzogs pa/_/
translated: The three are for the middling yogis, the worldly perfection stage.

analyzed: bzhi pa phyag rgya chen po'i tshhig gi dbang yang ni don dam nyid/_/dang po rig pa'i dbang bdun byin na/
translated: If the seven empowerments of knowledge are conferred first,

original: gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor zhes bya ba/
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor zhes bya ba/
translated: the so-called nondual yogağŸ”½purifies the taints of body, voice, and mind.ğŸ”½The permission bestowal purifies the obscurations of knowledge.

original: lus ngag yid gsum gyi dri ma dag pa'o/_/rjes su gnang bas shes bya'i sgrib pa dag_/rdo rje slob dpon yab yum
analyzed: lus ngag yid gsum gyi dri ma dag pa'o/_/rjes su gnang bas shes bya'i sgrib pa dag_/rdo rje slob dpon yab yum
translated: The vajra master and the master of awareness

original: snyoms par zhugs pa bum pa'i dbang byang chub kyi sems lce la byin pa gsang ba'i dbang /_shes rab ma dngos sam yid
analyzed: snyoms par zhugs pa bum pa'i dbang byang chub kyi sems lce la byin pa gsang ba'i dbang /_shes rab ma dngos sam yid
translated: enter into union. The vase empowerment is the bodhicitta placed on the tongue. The secret empowerment is the actual wisdom consort or the mental awareness consort.ğŸ”½The wisdom empowerment is the arousal of bliss.

original: kyi rig ma ka ra na'i phyag rgya bde ba sad pa shes rab ye shes so/_/de nyams su myong la brjed ma shes pa gsal la ngos
analyzed: kyi rig ma ka ra na'i phyag rgya bde ba sad pa shes rab ye shes so/_/de nyams su myong la brjed ma shes pa gsal la ngos
translated: The fourth empowerment is the experience of that, not forgetting, clarity, and being free from grasping.

original: gzung med pa de bzhi pa'o/_/skye 'gag med pa'i sems kyi snang ba de rtogs pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa 'gyur ba med
analyzed: gzung med pa de bzhi pa'o/_/skye 'gag med pa'i sems kyi snang ba de rtogs pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa 'gyur ba med
